question: When it comes to cultural identity, which of the following do the overwhelming majority of Black people believe is a major contributor and attribute?

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. An overwhelming majority of Black people believe that factors other than immigration status and conventionality are a major part of the Black identity.
That’s not correct. An overwhelming majority of Black people believe that factors other than education and income level are a major part of the Black identity.
That’s not correct. An overwhelming majority of Black people believe that factors other than cultural duality and relationships are a major part of the Black identity.
An overwhelming majority of Black people believe that race and community engagement are a major part of the Black identity.

detailedSolution: An overwhelming majority of Black people believe that race and community engagement are a major part of the Black identity.
